channel.title: Looking for developers to create a 317 server with me
channel.description:
[b][i]Introduction[/i][/b]
Hi there. My name is Empty. Well no, that's not my real name ofcourse, but it's my prefered "gamer" name. Anywayyyy ... I'm 17 years old, and I've been playing Runescape and RSps's since I was very young, mostly together with my older brother. This gave me quite alot of knowledge in the game itself. Ofcourse, like alot of people, playing the game wasn't enough. I wanted to actually be able to mage my "own game", so I started to experiment with making my own RSPS. I was way too young at that time so I only was able to get some experience, I had not enough knowledge nor willpower to actually go through with it. But now, many years later I decided to try it again, hoping this time I'm able to learn even more and get a server online, with some help :)
[b]What do I have to offer ?[/b]
- cash to buy a domain and a vps (the budget on how much I want to invest depends on the quality of the server.) - basic coding skills - free time to spend on learning and coding - a positive attitude and the ability to talk to people calmly. - basic english, dutch and french (my french isn't that great) - players
[b]What do I expect from you ?[/b]
- great coding skills :D - time to spend in the server - basic english
[b]What do you get from this ? [/b] - A chance to showoff your skills :D - 50% of all the donations
[u]If you are interested or have a question please add me on skype, send me a message on mopar or comment on this thread. Sorry for my bad english, it's not my native language and I made this on my mobile so there might be typos :)[/u]
My skype: Janneee98

item.title: Looking for developers to create a 317 server with me
item.dc:creator: @facundo facundo
item.description:
@facundo wrote:

Hello, I’m not a very experienced coder but I’ve had a server some time ago, been a Runescape Player for YEARS, and I’d love to help making the server and even might be able to host it. Added you on Skype.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for developers to create a 317 server with me

item.title: Looking for developers to create a 317 server with me
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Empty Mr Empty
item.description:
@Mr_Empty wrote:

Introduction

Hi there.
My name is Empty. Well no, that’s not my real name ofcourse, but it’s my prefered “gamer” name.
Anywayyyy … I’m 17 years old, and I’ve been playing Runescape and RSps’s since I was very young, mostly together with my older brother. This gave me quite alot of knowledge in the game itself. Ofcourse, like alot of people, playing the game wasn’t enough. I wanted to actually be able to mage my “own game”, so I started to experiment with making my own RSPS. I was way too young at that time so I only was able to get some experience, I had not enough knowledge nor willpower to actually go through with it. But now, many years later I decided to try it again, hoping this time I’m able to learn even more and get a server online, with some help

What do I have to offer ?

  • cash to buy a domain and a vps (the budget on how much I want to invest depends on the quality of the server.)
  • basic coding skills
  • free time to spend on learning and coding
  • a positive attitude and the ability to talk to people calmly.
  • basic english, dutch and french (my french isn’t that great)
  • players

What do I expect from you ?

  • great coding skills
  • time to spend in the server
  • basic english

What do you get from this ?

  • A chance to showoff your skills
  • 50% of all the donations

If you are interested or have a question please add me on skype, send me a message on mopar or comment on this thread. Sorry for my bad english, it’s not my native language and I made this on my mobile so there might be typos

My skype: Janneee98
